text: Albin Planinc or Albin Planinec (18 April 1944 â€“ 20 December 2008) was a chess Grandmaster from Slovenia. He won the Slovenian Chess Championship in 1968 and 1971. Planinc enjoyed playing old, rarely used openings, and had an tactical style of play that led to some brilliant wins, but also some bad losses.* Burgess, Graham, John Nunn, and John Emms.
